verses.verse: After these things I saw four angels standing at the four quarters of the earth holding back the four winds, so that no wind would blow on the earth, sea, or any tree.
I saw another angel ascending from the east having the seal of the living God. He called out loudly to the four angels to whom it given to hurt the earth and the sea,
saying, "Do not hurt the earth, sea, or trees, until we have sealed the servants of our God on their foreheads".
I heard the number of those who were sealed. [It was] one hundred forty four thousand from all the tribes of the children of Israel.
From Judah twelve thousand were sealed, from Reuben twelve thousand, from Gad twelve thousand,
from Asher twelve thousand, from Naphtali twelve thousand, from Manasseh twelve thousand,
from Simeon twelve thousand, from Levi twelve thousand, from Issachar twelve thousand,
from Zebulun twelve thousand, from Joseph twelve thousand, and from Benjamin twelve thousand.

After this I looked and, lo, a huge crowd, that no one could count the number, from all nations, tribes, peoples, and languages stood in front of the throne and before the Lamb; they were dressed in white robes and palms in their hands.
They called out loudly saying, "Salvation comes from God who sits on the throne and from the Lamb".
All the angels, elders, and four living creatures stood surrounding the throne, dropped down in front of the throne on their faces, and worshipped God,
saying, "Amen! Blessing, glory, wisdom, thanksgiving, honor, power, and strength [belong] to our God forever and ever. Amen."
One of the elders asked me, "Who are these who are clothed with white robes, and where did they come from?"
I said to him, "Sir, you know." He then said to me, "These are those who came out of the great tribulation and have washed their robes and made them white in the blood of the Lamb.
"That is why they are in front of God's throne and serve him day and night in his temple. He who sits on the throne will live with them.
"They will never again be hungry or thirsty, neither will sun rays beat on them and burn them,
because the Lamb, who is in the center of the throne will feed them and lead them to living springs of waters, and God will wipe away all tears from their eyes."
